title: “China-SL ties, a model of friendship, win-win cooperation...”
content: China-Sri Lanka relations have become a model of friendship and win-win cooperation between big and small countries, said Chinese President Xi Jinping yesterday (17).He was sending a congratulatory letter to a meeting of Chinese and Sri Lankan political parties, marking the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries and the 70th anniversary of the signing of the Rubber-Rice Pact.President Xi, also general secretary of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee, said China and Sri Lanka signed the historic Rubber-Rice Pact 70 years ago, opening the door of friendly exchanges between the two sides.The five-year trade agreement was signed in December 1952 when China needed to import rubber and other supplies while Sri Lanka, a rubber exporter, was facing rising rice prices and a slump in rubber prices.
